# limel-snackbar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                        | Type      |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- |
| `actionText` | `action-text` | The text to display for the action button.                         | `string`  |
| `message`    | `message`     | The text message to display.                                       | `string`  |
| `multiline`  | `multiline`   | Whether to show the snackbar with space for multiple lines of text | `boolean` |
| `timeout`    | `timeout`     | The amount of time in milliseconds to show the snackbar.           | `number`  |


## Events

| Event    | Detail | Description                               |
| -------- | ------ | ----------------------------------------- |
| `action` |        | Emitted when the action button is pressed |
| `hide`   |        | Emitted when the snackbar hides itself    |


## Methods

### `show() => void`

Show the snackbar

#### Returns

Type: `void`
